description: This dashboard displays the GPU performance metrics like Utilization, Temperature, Power Consumption, Memory and more using the OpenTelemetry Metrics generated using [OpenLIT SDK] (https://github.com/openlit/openlit) or the [OTel GPU Collector](https://github.com/openlit/openlit/tree/main/otel-gpu-collector).
title: GPU Monitoring

widgets.description: This panel displays the Average GPU Utilization
